short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select an address, right click and search it on Google Maps directly. Directly find an address found on a website with 2 clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a button when you select and right click on an address. This button will open Google Maps to the address you selected. 
No need to copy/paste and waste time.
